  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>65309</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_501</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_501</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Ecuaciones de 2º grado</string>
            <string language="en">Quadratic equations.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Quadratische Gleichungen.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Équations quadratiques.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Equações quadráticas.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Equazioni quadratiche.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δευτέρου βαθμού εξισώσεις.</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones la ecuación de segundo grado. Se estudia la manera de resolver ecuaciones incompletas y completas de segundo grado, así como ecuaciones bicuadradas. También se estudia la forma de las soluciones a partir del discriminante.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to solve quadratic equations, including complete and incomplete equations and biquadratic equations. It also discusses the types of solutions by examining the discriminant.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">bicuadrada</string>
            <string language="en">biquadratic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">soluciones</string>
            <string language="en">solutions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">ecuación</string>
            <string language="en">equation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">discriminante</string>
            <string language="en">discriminant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">segundo grado</string>
            <string language="en">quadratic</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch Simulationen, 
quadratische Gleichungen, einschließlich die kompletten und 
unvollständigen Gleichungen und die biquadratic Gleichungen zu 
lösen. Sie behandelt auch die Typen der Lösungen, indem sie 
das diskriminierende überprüfen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations simulations de 
résoudre des équations quadratiques, y compris des équations 
complètes et inachevées et des équations biquadratiques. Elle
discute également les types de solutions en examinant le 
discriminant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações resolver 
equações quadráticas, including equações completas e incompletas 
e equações biquadratic. Discute também os tipos de soluções
examinando o discriminant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni risolvere le 
equazioni quadratiche, compreso le equazioni complete ed incomplete e 
le equazioni biquadratic. Egualmente discute i tipi di soluzioni
esaminando il discriminante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να λύσει τις δευτέρου βαθμού εξισώσεις, συμπεριλαμβανομένων 
των πλήρων και ελλιπών εξισώσεων και των διτετράγωνων εξισώσεων. 
Συζητά επίσης τους τύπους λύσεων με την εξέταση της 
διακρίνουσας.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">biquadratic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lösungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gleichung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">diskriminierend</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">quadratisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">bicarré</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">solutions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">équation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
